| Module | Objective | Delivery | Overview | Outcomes | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Getting the culture right | Define a public statement from your organisation on your commitment to people with convictions | Consult | Don't sit on the fence – make a clear commitment to support people with convictions. Develop a transparent and public stance on your organisation's commitment to supporting individuals with convictions, ensuring it reaches the right people. | 1. A well-defined public statement reflecting your organisation's commitment to people with convictions.
2. Integrated statement into your organisation's website, supply chain, and induction processes.
3. Prepared stakeholders to address potential negative responses effectively.
4. A tailored communication plan to ensure the statement reaches the right stakeholders.
5. Gained skills in effectively communicating your commitment to internal and external audiences.
6. An ongoing process for reviewing the impact of the public statement and adapting your approach as necessary. |
